title: Langflow: Platform Redesign
summary:
Langflow had accumulated years of experience debt. The UI was dated, the mental model was inconsistent, and the product no longer reflected the pace or expectations of modern AI development.

In parallel with a brand refresh, I led a full end-to-end redesign of the platform to modernize Langflow quickly and decisively.

I owned the entire product surface. Information architecture, interaction patterns, visual language, and shipped quality.

sections.heading: System level change
sections.caption:
This work went far beyond visual polish. The redesign addressed foundational UX problems using appropriate, modern patterns.

- Established clear hierarchy and sign-posting across the product.
- Drastically improved usability by reducing noise and cognitive load.
- Moved beyond raw concepts like “tokens” and “variables” toward intent-driven configuration.
- Reframed the experience so Langflow felt like a serious, modern platform.

sections.heading: Impact
sections.caption:
My design work helped grow Langflow from a technically capable but fragmented product into DataStax's tip of the spear. It became a major driver of top-of-funnel growth and increased Astra DB consumption on our cloud platform.

A major redesign helped put Langflow on stage with Jensen Huang. During my time as lead designer, Langflow grew from 14k to 144k GitHub stars.

The response to the work was strong, both internally and externally.

Overall, I helped evolve Langflow from a promising prototype into a modern developer tool that belongs in today's AI stack.
